reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Spigen Tempered Glass Screen Protector designed for iPhone 14 Plus/iPhone 13 Pro Max [2 Pack] has proven to be a valuable addition to my iPhone. Here's why I find it to be a great product:1. **Excellent Protection**: The primary purpose of a screen protector is to safeguard your phone's display, and this one does it exceptionally well. The tempered glass construction provides robust protection against scratches, scuffs, and minor impacts, ensuring the iPhone's screen remains in pristine condition.2. **Precision Fit**: Spigen is known for its precise and accurate designs, and this screen protector is no exception. It fits the iPhone 14 Plus/iPhone 13 Pro Max perfectly, covering the entire screen without interfering with the phone's sensors, front camera, or touch sensitivity.3. **Smooth Touch Sensitivity**: The screen protector maintains the iPhone's touch sensitivity. I didn't experience any lag or loss of responsiveness when using the device with the protector in place. It feels like there's no screen protector at all.4. **Crystal Clear Clarity**: The transparency of this screen protector is outstanding. It doesn't affect the iPhone's display quality, ensuring that you can enjoy the device's vibrant colors and sharpness without compromise.5. **Easy Installation**: Spigen includes everything you need for a straightforward installation, including cleaning materials and detailed instructions. The installation process was hassle-free, and I had no issues with bubbles or misalignment.6. **Durability**: I've found this screen protector to be highly durable. It withstands daily wear and tear, including pocket encounters with keys and coins, without showing any signs of damage.7. **2-Pack**: The inclusion of two screen protectors in the package is a great value. It provides a spare in case the first one gets damaged or for future use.8. **Oleophobic Coating**: The oleophobic coating helps repel fingerprints and smudges, keeping the screen cleaner and more visually appealing.In conclusion, the Spigen Tempered Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 14 Plus/iPhone 13 Pro Max is an excellent investment for protecting your valuable device. It offers top-notch screen protection, precise fit, smooth touch sensitivity, and crystal-clear clarity. The ease of installation, durability, and 2-pack value make it a standout choice. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to safeguard their iPhone's screen without compromising on quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Probably the best screen protector on the market
reviews.reviewText: I have about 10 years of experience with screen protectors. First, I will always advocate for a tempered glass screen protector over film. Tempered glass offers really protection against drops and scratches. For example, I once was working out several years ago and dropped 100 lb dumbbell on another phone that had tempered glass screen protection. The screen protector cracked and shattered, but the phone itself remained in perfect condition. That incident confirmed my understanding that tempered glass screen protectors are always the way to go. By contrast, a film screen protector only really "protects" your phone against scratches. But if you were to drop your phone, or drop an item onto your phone, your phone might experience real damage.Onto the specifics of this screen protector. There's only a few vital components to keep in mind:- Does it protect the phone? yes- Does it fit the dimensions of the phone / fully cover the screen? yes- Is it comfortable to swipe on? yes- Is it easy to install? most definitely yesThe main difficulty in screen protectors is the installation process. Many screen protectors don't come with the stencil cover which enables an easy installation. So usually you are tasked with having to be extra careful with installing the screen protector, which inevitably means bubbles underneath the protector. You have to spend a lot of time getting rid of the bubbles. Not here with the Spigen screen protector.You clean the phone with materials given, you apply the stencil covering over the phone, you press down on the sticker, you wait 30 seconds, then you take off the stencil covering. And you're pretty much done. You have a perfect fit and perfect covering over your iphone pro 13 max. No bubbles.Spigen is a proven Korean brand. They are immersed in the world of technology, technology manufacturing, and product quality. I would recommend this product 10 times over. Can't imagine a better alternative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Screen Protector
reviews.reviewText: This protector is the best quality protector I have ever owned for any phone at any price point. It's worth paying more than a few bucks, but also not worth getting ripped off buying a piece of tempered glass for $50. This product falls right in between that giving the absolute best for your buck. A great quality piece of glass with the easiest, most intuitive installation. The alignment is perfect every time and leaves no room for guess work. It is also tough and lasts. It's saved my screen multiple times and if it has cracked after a hard fall, I happily replace it with another. Another plus is that is comes with two. I will buy this protector for all my future phones as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even a Neanderthal could do this
reviews.reviewText: The application process of this screen protector is so intuitive and well designed. The plastic mold fits my phone perfectly and aligns the screen protector perfectly. Unlike some other screen protector molds, this one comes with the screen protector already attached and lined up perfectly to the mold. Super easy process that even a Neanderthal could do.
